wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth 'Richard' Knight (born 18 May 1928) was a British rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He represented England and won two bronze medals in the coxed four and eights at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia.
